headline: Why SBC is seen as a ’critical lever’ in AI talent wars
summary: Investing.com -- As competition for artificial intelligence expertise intensifies, stock-based compensation (SBC) is becoming a key tool for technology companies to attract and retain talent, according to Morgan Stanley.

headline: Broadcom Inc. (AVGO)’s Director Sells 80 Shares at $307.46 Each; Goldman Sachs Reiterates ‘Buy’ Rating
summary: Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ:AVGO) is one of the 14 Best IT Stocks to Buy for the Long Term. On August 15, 2025, Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ:AVGO) announced that Director Justine Page sold 800 shares on the previous day at $307.46 each. The sale, valued at $246,000, was conducted under a pre-arranged Rule 10b5-1 plan established in January. […]

headline: Why Analysts Say NVIDIA Remains the Best AI Play
summary: NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) is one of the Must-Watch AI Stocks for Investors. On August 19, TD Cowen analyst Joshua Buchalter raised the price target on the stock to $235.00 (from $175.00) while maintaining a Buy rating. According to the analysts, Nvidia shares trade at a discount to Broadcom even though they have a “cleaner set-up. They […]
